meanings.definition: A building containing two separate living units
meanings.sent1: The duplexes on Maple Street have red doors.
meanings.sent2: My friend and I live in neighboring duplexes.
meanings.sent3: The duplexes decided to have a race to see who could paint their door first.
meanings.sent4: The duplexes stood side by side, like two peas in a pod.
meanings.sent5: The duplexes looked identical, with matching windows and roofs.

meanings.definition: A pair of anything having two similar parts
meanings.sent1: I found a pair of duplexes keys in the drawer.
meanings.sent2: The twins wore matching duplexes bracelets.
meanings.sent3: The duplexes of socks were missing their partners.
meanings.sent4: The duplexes of birds chirped in unison.
meanings.sent5: The duplexes of gloves kept my hands warm in the snow.
